content.description:
You probably won't be caught in a shoot-out going here, Ken named the crag becasue it was in the between Sunrise and Sunset...although much closer to Sunset. 

  A small crag, about 30 ft high.   

  The Blue Book lists 10 climbs, L to R:    Misfire 5.4 X   Blunderbust 5.8 X   Empty Chamber 5.4   True Grit 5.9+  1-star   Birch Bark Crack  5.9+  1-star   Gunslinger  5.11-  R-Hooks  1-star   Bounty Hunters  5.10 R  2-stars   Shootout  5.10+ X    Boot Hill  5.9+  1-star   Bite the Bullet  5.10  1-star
